metadata.title: CVE-2020-24332 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in TrouSerS through 0.3.14. If the tcsd daemon isstarted with root privileges, the creation of the system.data file is proneto symlink attacks. The tss user can be used to create or corrupt existingfiles, which could possibly lead to a DoS attack.

criterions.comment: trousers: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
